Class ActivityWebSocketHandler

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.socket.handler.AbstractWebSocketHandler
org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler
com.ticketing.ticketingsystem.websocket.ActivityWebSocketHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketHandler
@Component public class ActivityWebSocketHandler extends org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler
WebSocket handler for managing WebSocket connections and broadcasting messages to all connected clients.

      public void afterConnectionEstablished(org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession session) throws Exception
      Handles a new WebSocket connection by adding the session to the list of active sessions.
      Specified by:

      Overrides:
      afterConnectionEstablished in class org.springframework.web.socket.handler.AbstractWebSocketHandler
      Parameters:
      session - the WebSocket session for the new connection.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during connection establishment.

    • afterConnectionClosed

      public void afterConnectionClosed(org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession session, org.springframework.web.socket.CloseStatus status) throws Exception
      Handles the closure of a WebSocket connection by removing the session from the list of active sessions.
      Specified by:
      afterConnectionClosed in interface org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketHandler
      Overrides:
      afterConnectionClosed in class org.springframework.web.socket.handler.AbstractWebSocketHandler
      Parameters:
      session - the WebSocket session that was closed.
      status - the status of the connection closure.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during connection closure.
